channel.title: Codes for Report Abuse
channel.description:
What is the code I can add to have the report abuse thing work on my server?
I want it so mods and admins can mute other players using the system, and I want it so it sends a file of me containing the reporter, rule broken, and the last 60 seconds of chat/trade.
What is the code for this? All help appreciated! Thanks!

item.title: Codes for Report Abuse
item.dc:creator: @cloudnine cloudnine
